beforeCode.label: Before code
beforeCode.description: The code snippet to display in the "before" section.

afterCode.label: After code
afterCode.description: The code snippet to display in the "after" section.

language.label: Language
language.description: The language of the code snippets (e.g., "typescript").

filename.label: File name
filename.description: The filename to display for the code snippets.

lightTheme.label: Light theme
lightTheme.description: The theme to use for light mode (e.g., "github-light"). You can see all available options [here](https://shiki.style/themes).

darkTheme.label: Dark theme
darkTheme.description: The theme to use for dark mode (e.g., "github-dark"). You can see all available options [here](https://shiki.style/themes).

highlightColor.label: Highlight color
highlightColor.description: The color to use for highlighting the code snippets. The default color is #657585.
